MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in L4 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Church Road West, Hampden Street, County Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:30PM. Our engineers have arrived  on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, we  expect the power to be restored by 8:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:35PM on 21st January 2021
